meanings.sent1: She solates the red blocks from the blue ones.
meanings.sent2: The teacher solates the noisy students during tests.
meanings.sent3: The cat solates itself in the cozy corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: The thick fog solates the house from the rest of the village.
meanings.sent5: He solates the key ingredients before starting the recipe.

meanings.definition: Solates (noun): individuals or groups that are isolated or separated from others
meanings.sent1: The solates in the library prefer quiet reading.
meanings.sent2: The solates in the study group work independently.
meanings.sent3: The solates at the party found each other and had a great time.
meanings.sent4: The solates in the forest formed a unique ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The solates in the office have their own way of doing things.
